ComicInfo.Summary:
Superstar creator Rob Liefeld takes on fan-favorite Snake Eyes! Snake Eyes is caught in the crosshairs. Will he be able to escape this lethal challenge? Or will he, like others before him, fall to the power of... the Deadgame?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Rob Liefeld (a) & Federico Blee (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Rob Liefeld (a) & Bryan Valenza (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Rob Liefeld (a) & Jay David Ramos (c) | 3 | RE | Unknown Comics Exclusive Variant Cover A (Virgin) | Kael Ngu | 4 | RE | Unknown Comics Exclusive Variant Cover B (Virgin) | Kael Ngu | 5 |
